code: import React from"react";import"./Blog.scss";import{useRecipe}from"../../context/RecipeContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Blog(){const{data}=useRecipe();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"common-heading",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-black font-48",children:"Blog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-primary",children:"View more"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-posts",children:data.map((item,index)=>item.blogimage?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-card-img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.blogimage,alt:"img"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-card-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"font-24 text-black",children:item.blogheading}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.blogslogan})]})]},index):null)})]});}export default Blog;
